reviews.name: La Table Française
reviews.review: Rich broth, perfectly caramelized onions, and the gruyère was top-tier. Bread held up well!

reviews.name: Brothy’s Bites
reviews.review: Good flavor but the cheese had slipped off the toast. Bonus points for crispy onions on top.

reviews.name: The Crock Pot Inn
reviews.review: Classic presentation. Slightly salty, but great texture on the cheese crust.
